title: Bloomberg Markets: Berger on Alibaba Earnings and Outlook

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Joseph Berger Chief Executive Officer Pacific Epoch Discussing Alibaba understanding and meeting the needs of the Chinese consumer.
